metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4165 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ntop allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the title parameter in a list action to plugins/rrdPlugin.

criterions.comment: ntop: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
